attributes.action: halt planning developments that have been branded cynically as 'Eco-Towns' in order to by pass planning laws and build on green belt land. For example the proposed 'New Kingston' development on land surrounding East Leake and Gotham in South Nottinghamshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Really I am at a loss as to explain how any development on this scale can be classed eco friendly. I do not believe that their is scientific fact behind these claims. The original Eco-Towns were supposedly destined for brown field sites, but that seems to have been long forgotten.
